com.emc.object.s3

Class S3Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.object.ObjectConfig<S3Config>
      • com.emc.object.s3.S3Config
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    S3VHostConfig

    public class S3Config
extends ObjectConfig<S3Config>
    By default, the smart client is enabled, which means virtual host-style buckets/namespaces cannot be used. To use virtual host-style requests, construct an S3VHostConfig instead. That will disable the smart client and set a single host endpoint, prepending namespaces and buckets as appropriate.
